snippet.title: BitCraft - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer 4K
snippet.description:
First official look at gameplay in BitCraft!

BitCraft is a community sandbox massively multiplayer online (MMO) game set in a fantasy world which encourages many different play styles ranging from farming, hunting, and crafting to city-building and social strategy, rather than emphasizing combat alone. As players shape the world for their own purposes they will begin to uncover an ancient past.

Sign up to play now: https://www.bitcraftonline.com
Join the community: https://discord.gg/bitcraft
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitCraftOnline
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bitcraftonline
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitcraftonline
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BitCraftOnline

Music by Austin Wintory & Rachel Hardy

00:00 - Intro
00:43 - Choose your path
00:54 - Shape the world
01:20 - Rebuild Civilization
01:37 - Meet unique travelers...
01:50 - Explore a vast world
02:07 - Uncover secrets of the past
02:28 - Outro
